sentences.sContent: The government denied the existence of poverty among 16- and 17-year-olds.
sentences.sCn: 政府否认十六七岁的青少年当中存在贫困问题。

sentences.sContent: ...Don't Judge a Book by Its Cover!No one can deny the fact that people have always tended to be misguided by the pretty images...

...no one can deny the fact that the new information age has brought us so much convenience that we are allowed to get plenty of information just with a simple click sitting in front of the computers...

synos.tran: 否定，否认；拒绝给予；拒绝…的要求

phrases.pCn: deny someone something 拒绝给予

words.tran: 可否认的；可拒绝的；可否定的

trans.tranOther: to say that something is not true, or that you do not believe something
